lead_paragraph: The appointment of Marc Ouellet to head the Vatican’s Congregation for Bishops is the most significant personnel change since the sex abuse scandal began roiling the Catholic Church this spring.
snippet: The appointment of Marc Ouellet to head the Vatican’s Congregation for Bishops is the most significant personnel change since the sex abuse scandal began roiling the Catholic Church this spring.

headline.main: Canadian Cardinal Named to a Top Vatican Job
headline.seo: Canadian Cardinal Named to a Top Vatican Job
headline.print_headline: Canadian Cardinal Named to a Top Vatican Job
